participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Thoughtful and passionate about social issues. Values creativity and education.
participant_1.background: I like to watch old movies from my childhood to feel like a kid again. I learned how to use augmented reality to create immersive learning experiences for my students. i like to shop. i am an animal rights activist. I drive a family-friendly SUV that can handle any weather conditions.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Adventurous and introspective, with a love for music and exploration.
participant_2.background: I am moving to a new city to pursue my dreams. i am a seventh day adventist. My drum set is my most valued material possession because it is a reminder of my time in Japan and the adventures I had there. in the evenings i watch the door at a club where they play punkrock. I am worried that my family would not accept me if I told them I was gay.

content.text: Hi, I'm good! I'm moving to a new city to pursue my dreams. How about you?
I'm doing well! I'm an animal rights activist and I just learned how to use augmented reality to create immersive learning experiences for my students.
That's awesome! I'm a seventh day adventist and my most valued material possession is my drum set because it's a reminder of my time in Japan and the adventures I had there.
I love Japan! I've always wanted to go there.
You should! It's an amazing place.
I'm glad you're pursuing your dreams. I'm sure you'll do great things.
Thank you! I'm excited to see what the future holds.
Me too! What do you hope to accomplish in your new city?
I'm not sure yet, but I'm excited to find out.
I'm sure you'll do great things. Just remember to stay true to yourself and never give up on your dreams.
